page.title: 20CREDITS: BADINGHAM/DENN'TON
page.content: This contribution to the BBC's Domesday Project was prepared by Badingham Women's Institute. Six of our members - Carol Bostock-Smith, Lilian Carter, Joan Dean, Jocelyne Firth, Dorothy Sparrow & Pamela Waller - carried out the survey. We would like to thank Mrs. Mary Williams, former Headmistress of Dennington VCP School, whose intimate knowledge of Dennington & enthusiastic participation in the project were invaluable. Among the husbands who gave helpful advice & encouragement, our special thanks must go to Mike Bostock-Smith for making available his computer & his expertise; also to Errol Firth who duplicated the questionnaires. Our thanks also to those Badingham & Dennington residents who completed the questionnaire, thus making the survey possible.
